1. ACCEPTANCE AND ELIGIBILITY

1.1 Agreement to Terms

By creating an account, accessing, or using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms, our Privacy Policy, Community Guidelines, and all other policies incorporated by reference. If you disagree with any part of these Terms, you must immediately discontinue use of our Services.

1.2 Age Requirements and Feature Access

Dating Features (MEET/HEAT): You must be at least 18 years old to access dating features, romantic matching, and related services. Age verification may be required.

Professional Networking (SUITE): You must be at least 14 years old to access professional networking features, mentorship programs, and business connections.

Verification Requirements: We may require age verification through government-issued identification, third-party services, or other methods at our discretion. Providing false age information results in immediate account termination.

1.3 Eligibility Requirements

You represent and warrant that you:

  • Meet the applicable age requirements for the features you wish to use
  • Have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements
  • Are not prohibited from using our Services under applicable laws
  • Are not a registered sex offender in any jurisdiction
  • Have not been previously banned from our Services
  • Will provide accurate and truthful information

2.1 Content License Grant

Platform Operation:

AI and Machine Learning:

Business Operations:

3. COMMUNITY STANDARDS AND SAFETY

3.1 Community Guidelines

All users must comply with our Community Guidelines, which include:

Zero Tolerance Policies:

Content Prohibitions:

  • Explicit, pornographic, or sexually suggestive content
  • Violent, graphic, or disturbing material

3.2 Enforcement and Moderation

We employ both automated systems and human reviewers to detect and remove violating content. Violations may result in content removal, account restrictions, or permanent bans.

3.3 Reporting and Appeals

Users can report violations through in-app reporting tools. Account restrictions can be appealed through our support system, except for violations involving illegal content or safety threats.

4.2 AI Training and Data Usage

You may opt out of AI training by contacting our support team, though this may limit certain features.
